name: Unigine Heaven

write_file.content: cd /home/steamer/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64/drive_c/Program\ Files\ \(x86\)/Unigine/Heaven Benchmark 4.0 && WINEPREFIX="/home/steamer/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64" wine start heaven.bat

content:
files:
- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t6zttuxkYv0
- Unigine_Heaven-4.0.exe: https://assets.unigine.com/d/Unigine_Heaven-4.0.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  args: -config ../data/launcher/launcher.xml
  custom-name: Unigine Heaven 4.0 benchmark
  description: Benchmarking DirectX9, X10, X11, DXVK.
  exe: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Unigine/Heaven
    Benchmark 4.0/bin/browser_x86.exe
  prefix: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64
installer:
- execute:
    command: mv -v $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64 /tmp/dump
    description: Removing any existing wine-prefixes ...
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating 64-bit prefix ...
    name: create_prefix
- move:
    dst: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64/drive_c/
    src: Unigine_Heaven-4.0.exe
- chmodx: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64/drive_c/Unigine_Heaven-4.0.exe
- task:
    description: Unigine_Heaven 4.0 ...
    executable: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64/drive_c/Unigine_Heaven-4.0.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64
- task:
    app: vcrun2017
    arch: win64
    description: Visual C++ 2017 libraries ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64
- task:
    app: win81
    arch: win64
    description: Windows version 8.1 ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64
- task:
    app: dxvk
    arch: win64
    description: Vulkan ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64
- write_file:
    content: cd /home/steamer/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64/drive_c/Program\
      Files\ \(x86\)/Unigine/Heaven Benchmark 4.0 && WINEPREFIX="/home/steamer/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64"
      wine start heaven.bat
    description: Creating Unigine_Heaven_benchmark.sh with prefix ...
    file: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64/drive_c/Unigine_Heaven_benchmark.sh
- chmodx: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64/drive_c/Unigine_Heaven_benchmark.sh
- execute:
    command: rm $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/wine/prefix64/drive_c/Unigine_Heaven-4.0.exe
    description: Clean-up ...
system:
  xboxdrv: xboxdrv
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
